'''Roaming Pokémon''' are rare Pokémon that can be found randomly while on routes. Each [[Region|region]] has a set of Roaming Pokémon that can be caught. So far, only Mew and Manaphy have no requirements to appear. ==Odds== ''For a breakdown of roaming chances on every route, visit the [[Route Statistics]] page.'' The chance to encounter a roaming Pokémon is 1/8192 for the first route of a region, and increases linearly up to 1/4096 for the last route of a region. "First" and "last" here refer to the health of the Pokémon on these routes, not necessarily the order they are unlocked. This means that a route you can 1-shot will always be at least as efficient as a route you can't, so it is recommended to idle on the highest route number you can 1-shot if you need them. ==Regions== {| class="wikitable sortable collapsible" |- !
